verses.verse: The burden<WH9294> of the word<WH1697> of the Lord<WH3068> is against the land<WH776> of Hadrach,<WH2317> with Damascus<WH1834> as its resting<WH4496> place<WH4496> (for the eyes<WH5869> of men,<WH120> especially of all<WH3605> the tribes<WH7626> of Israel,<WH3478> are toward the Lord<WH3068>),
And Hamath<WH2574> also,<WH1571> which borders<WH1379> on it; Tyre<WH6865> and Sidon,<WH6721> though<WH3588> they are very<WH3966> wise.<WH2449>
For Tyre<WH6865> built<WH1129> herself a fortress<WH4692> And piled<WH6651> up silver<WH3701> like dust,<WH6083> And gold<WH2742> like the mire<WH2916> of the streets.<WH2351>
Behold,<WH2009> the Lord<WH136> will dispossess<WH3423> her And cast<WH5221> her wealth<WH2428> into the sea;<WH3220> And she will be consumed<WH398> with fire.<WH784>

Ashkelon<WH831> will see<WH7200> [it] and be afraid.<WH3372> Gaza<WH5804> too will writhe<WH9123> in great<WH3966> pain;<WH9123> Also Ekron,<WH6138> for her expectation<WH4007> has been<WH954> confounded.<WH954> Moreover, the king<WH4428> will perish from Gaza,<WH6> And Ashkelon<WH5804> will not be inhabited.<WH831>
And a mongrel<WH4464> race<WH4464> will dwell<WH3427> in Ashdod,<WH795> And I will cut<WH3772> off<WH3772> the pride<WH1347> of the Philistines.<WH6430>

And I will remove<WH5493> their blood<WH1818> from their mouth,<WH6310> And their detestable<WH8251> things<WH8251> from between<WH996> their teeth.<WH8127> Then they also<WH1571> will be a remnant<WH7604> for our God,<WH430> And be like a clan<WH441> in Judah,<WH3063> And Ekron<WH6138> like a Jebusite.<WH2983>

But I will camp<WH2583> around My house<WH1004> because<WH4480> of an army,<WH4675> Because<WH4480> of him who passes<WH5674> by and returns;<WH7725> And no<WH3808> oppressor<WH5065> will pass<WH5674> over<WH5921> them anymore,<WH5750> For now<WH6258> I have seen<WH7200> with My eyes.<WH5869>

Rejoice<WH1523> greatly,<WH3966> O daughter<WH1323> of Zion!<WH6726> Shout<WH7321> [in triumph,] O daughter<WH1323> of Jerusalem!<WH3389> Behold,<WH2009> your king<WH4428> is coming<WH935> to you; He is just<WH6662> and endowed<WH3467> with salvation,<WH3467> Humble,<WH6041> and mounted<WH7392> on a donkey,<WH2543> Even on a colt,<WH5895> the foal<WH1121> of a donkey.<WH860>

And I will cut<WH3772> off<WH3772> the chariot<WH7393> from Ephraim,<WH669> And the horse<WH5483> from Jerusalem;<WH3389> And the bow<WH7198> of war<WH4421> will be cut<WH3772> off.<WH3772> And He will speak<WH1696> peace<WH7965> to the nations;<WH1471> And His dominion<WH4915> will be from sea<WH3220> to sea,<WH3220> And from the River<WH5104> to the ends<WH657> of the earth.<WH776>
As for you also,<WH1571> because of the blood<WH1818> of [My] covenant<WH1285> with you, I have set<WH7971> your prisoners<WH615> free<WH7971> from the waterless<WH369> <WH4325> pit.<WH953>
Return<WH7725> to the stronghold,<WH1225> O prisoners<WH615> who have the hope;<WH8615> This very<WH1571> day<WH3117> I am declaring<WH5046> that I will restore<WH7725> double<WH4932> to you.

For I will bend<WH1869> Judah<WH3063> as My bow,<WH7198> I will fill<WH4390> the bow<WH7198> with Ephraim.<WH669> And I will stir<WH5782> up your sons,<WH1121> O Zion,<WH6726> against<WH5921> your sons,<WH1121> O Greece;<WH3120> And I will make<WH7760> you like a warrior's sword.<WH2719>

Then the Lord<WH3068> will appear<WH7200> over<WH5921> them, And His arrow<WH2671> will go<WH3318> forth<WH3318> like lightning;<WH1300> And the Lord<WH136> God<WH3068> will blow<WH8628> the trumpet,<WH7782> And will march<WH1980> in the storm<WH9370> winds<WH9370> of the south.<WH8486>

The Lord<WH3068> of hosts<WH6635> will defend<WH1598> them. And they will devour,<WH398> and trample<WH3533> on the sling<WH9521> stones;<WH68> And they will drink,<WH8354> [and] be boisterous<WH1993> as with wine;<WH3196> And they will be filled<WH4390> like a [sacrificial] basin,<WH4219> [Drenched] like the corners<WH2106> of the altar.<WH4196>

And the Lord<WH3068> their God<WH430> will save<WH3467> them in that day<WH3117> As the flock<WH6629> of His people;<WH5971> For [they are as] the stones<WH68> of a crown,<WH5145> Sparkling<WH5264> in His land.<WH127>
For what<WH4100> comeliness<WH2898> and beauty<WH3308> [will be] theirs! Grain<WH1715> will make the young<WH970> men<WH970> flourish,<WH5107> and new<WH8492> wine<WH8492> the virgins.<WH1330>
